dialog.title: Google Keep Import
dialog.subtitle: Upload your Google Takeout ZIP to move notes, labels and attachments straight into Blinko.

dropzone.title: Select Google Takeout ZIP
dropzone.instructions: Drag your exported file here or click to choose it.
dropzone.hint: Only original ZIP exports from Google Takeout → Keep are supported.

instructions.title: How the import works
instructions.export: Visit takeout.google.com and select Google Keep.
instructions.zip: Export as ZIP and include both JSON data and media attachments.
instructions.import: Drop the ZIP here or select it with the button to start importing.

errors.invalidFile: Please choose a ZIP file exported from Google Keep.
errors.noNotes: No importable notes were found inside this archive.
errors.generic: Something went wrong while parsing the export.

toast.importPartial: Finished with warnings – some notes could not be imported.

security.title: Privacy
security.description: Everything stays on your device. Only the final notes are sent to your Blinko workspace.
